info.description: With this API you can manage users, invitations and keys.
info.title: Teleferic API

tags.name: initialize
tags.description: Operation available to initialize the DB

get.description: Get a user by its ID.

put.description: By passing an ID, updates parameters of the user.

parameters.name: userID
parameters.description: The ID of the user you want to update.

post.description: Add a user by an invitation

404.description: Error no invitation with that ID found.

406.description: error the invitation is not enabled/not for this address. pass proof not successful. signature did not match.

get.description: Get an invitation by its ID.

put.description: By passing an ID, updates parameters of the invitation.

parameters.name: invitationID
parameters.description: The ID of the invitation you want to update
